paragraph.paragraph: The metric archive panel is used to calculate and restore metric archives and to do metric archive comparison.
Let's have a look at the buttons and options related to metric archive calculataion:

../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/metrics_tool/debug_run_icon.png calculate archive
Start metric archive calculation After selecting the metrics you want to archive and the input domain, use this button to start a metric archive calculation.

../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/metrics_tool/debug_stop_icon.png stop archive
Stop metric archive calculation Use this button to stop a metric archive calculation.

../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/metrics_tool/interface22.png archive file location
Specify archive file The file to store metric archive results is specified here.

../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/metrics_tool/interface23.png reset archive
Reset archive file If the specified archive file already contains some archive information, this option will be sensitive. If it's enabled, the information contained in that archive file will be cleaned before new archive information is written to that file, otherwise, new archive information will be appended to that file.
